item.title: Edit Multiple Files at Once With Vim
item.description: Just the other day I engaged in an interesting project with my family. We grabbed the data about this TV Show from IMDb in order to create: A PostgreSQL database A presentation in LaTeX using the Beamer document class A statically generated web site with Hugo Once the database was ready everything else was relatively easy thanks to Vim.
